title: Standard Perk Math
overview: Most standard perks can be selected more than once in a round. The game has 2 formulas for multiplicative and additive perks.

additive_perks.formula: Total Bonus = Base Value × Quantity × (1 + Standard Perk Bonus)

multiplicative_perks.formula: Total Bonus = (1 + Base Value × Quantity) × (1 + Standard Perk Bonus)

standard_perk_bonus.description: Standard perk bonuses can be increased using the Standard Perk Bonus lab. This bonus applies to all standard perks and is calculated differently for additive and multiplicative perks
standard_perk_bonus.multiplicative_formula: (1 + perk base × quantity) × (1 + standard perk bonus)
standard_perk_bonus.additive_formula: Perk Base × quantity × (1 + standard perk bonus)
